thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Thomas Lemar move lined up by Antonio Conte | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Thomas Lemar move lined up by Antonio Conte | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Thomas Lemar move lined up by Antonio Conte | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 8:46 am Thomas Lemar is on Chelsea’s radar (Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea are weighing up a transfer move for Thomas Lemar, according to reports in France. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Lemar has scored 14 goals in 62 appearances for Monaco since making his debut for the Ligue 1 giants in 2015 but the 21-year-old has been linked with a move to the Premier League in recent months. 
L’Equipe suggest that Antonio Conte’s Chelsea, as well as Manchester City, Bayern Munich and Atletico Madrid, are interested in the young France midfielder. 
It’s understood Lemar’s talks over a new deal at Monaco have been put on hold for the time being which would allow the French outfit to jack up potential fee demands. Antonio Conte is an admirer of Thomas Lemar (Picture: Getty) 
Monaco currently value Lemar at around £30million after buying the promising starlet for just £3.4m from Caen back in two years ago.
